articles.title: Nipah virus: India to source 20 more doses of monoclonal antibody from Australia for treatment - First India
articles.description: New Delhi: India will procure from Australia 20 more doses of monoclonal antibody for the treatment of Nipah virus infection, the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) said on Friday.
articles.content:
New Delhi: India will procure from Australia 20 more doses of monoclonal antibody for the treatment of Nipah virus infection, the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) said on Friday.
